author: Asjylyn Loder
title: Volatility Is Back. Scarred ETF Investors Aren’t
text:
Exchange-traded products that enable investors to profit from wild price swings in stocks are enjoying big gains this year. But retail investors, who’ve been burned in the past by betting on volatility, are mostly steering clear of them.
The case for buying into volatility is the best it has been in years. Rising interest rates, fears of a trade war and a rout in technology stocks have triggered big swings in U.S. stocks, a contrast after an extended period of market calm. The S&P 500 stock index has moved more than 1%...
